Constant FAMILY

pub const FAMILY: &str;

A string describing the family of the operating system. An example value may be: "unix", or "windows".

This value may be an empty string if the family is unknown.

Full list of possible values
  • "unix"
  • "windows"
  • "itron"
  • "wasm"
  • ""
